question: Which among the following forests are referred to as confusion of stands?
explanation:
The most luxuriant forests in the tropical region are found in the equatorial area. These forests are called the rain forests. These forests have the largest variety of tree species. Large size of the trees and thick barks are the typical
characteristics of these forests. The large variety of trees makes rain forests suitable for production of a broad range of products. Due to a large number of species in a very small area these forests are referred to as confusion of stands.
